Message.Name: GetProperties
Message.Description: Send this message to request @{FromMobileMessages.Properties|Properties} return message.

Message.Name: GetVersion
Message.Description: Get the version number of all components in the VMS system

Field.Name: StandardReport1Interval
Field.Description: See @{Properties.StandardReport1Interval}.

Field.Name: LogReport3Rate
Field.Description: See @{Properties.LogReport3Rate}.

Message.Name: PollResponse1
Message.Description: This message is sent in response to a @{ToMobileMessages.PollRequest1|PollRequest1} request.

Field.Name: Timestamp
Field.Description: GPS UTC fix time in seconds since the epoch or terminal UTC time if GPS is blocked (see StatusBitmap). If GPS is blocked and the terminal is power cycled before terminal UTC time becomes known, 0 is used.

Field.Name: Latitude
Field.Description: GPS latitude in milli-minute resolution. If a valid GPS fix was never acquired, value 5460000 (equivalent to 91 degree) is used.

Field.Name: Longitude
Field.Description: GPS longitude in milli-minute resolution. If a valid GPS fix was never acquired, value 10860000 (equivalent to 181 degree) is used.

Field.Name: Speed
Field.Description: GPS speed in tenths of knots. 511 means 51.1 knots or more.

Field.Name: Course
Field.Description: GPS course in degrees. 361 is used when the speed is 0 knots.

Field.Name: Hdop
Field.Description: HDOP (Horizontal Dilution of Precision), a metric indicating GPS quality (255 if unavailable).

Field.Name: NumSats
Field.Description: Number of GPS satellites.

Field.Name: IdpCnr
Field.Description: IDP Average Carrier to Noise Ratio for the last full minute, in tenths of dBHz (0 if unavailable). 1023 means 102.3 dBHz or more.

Field.Name: StatusBitmap
Field.Description: Bitmap of current debounced VMS states. See @{Event.EventStateId}.

Field.Name: Hdop

Field.Name: NumSats
Field.Description: Number of GPS satellites.

Field.Name: IdpCnr

Field.Description: Bitmap of current debounced VMS states. See @{Event.EventStateId}.

Message.Name: Version
Message.Description: Version numbers of all components in the VMS system

Field.Name: Timestamp
Field.Description: GPS UTC fix time in seconds since the epoch or terminal UTC time if GPS is blocked (see StatusBitmap). If GPS is blocked and the terminal is power cycled before terminal UTC time becomes known, 0 is used.

Field.Name: IdpPackage
Field.Description: The version number of IDP pacakge

Field.Name: VmsAgent
Field.Description: The version number of VMS agent

Field.Name: HelmPanelInterface
Field.Description: The version number of Helm Panel Interface.

Field.Name: SourceCodeHash
Field.Description: The hash of source files.

Field.Name: PropDefHash
Field.Description: The hash of property definition file.

Field.Name: MessageDefHash
Field.Description: The hash of message definition file.

Message.Name: ConfigChangeReport1
Message.Description: This message is sent on change to any of the service 1 report configuration @{Properties|properties} to indicate the time of change and current and previous values.

Field.Name: ChangeSource
Field.Description: Source of the change. The field value is OtaMessage when properties are changed over-the-air via a @{ToMobileMessages.SetConfigReport1|SetConfigReport1} message; otherwise Console.

Field.Name: Timestamp
Field.Description: GPS UTC fix time in seconds since the epoch or terminal UTC time if GPS is blocked (see StatusBitmap). If GPS is blocked and the terminal is power cycled before terminal UTC time becomes known, 0 is used.

Field.Name: StatusBitmap
Field.Description: Bitmap of current debounced VMS states. See @{Event.EventStateId}.

Field.Name: StandardReport1Interval
Field.Description: Current @{Properties.StandardReport1Interval} value.

Field.Name: OldStandardReport1Interval
Field.Description: Previous @{Properties.StandardReport1Interval} value.

Field.Name: AcceleratedReport1Rate
Field.Description: Current @{Properties.AcceleratedReport1Rate} value.

Field.Name: OldAcceleratedReport1Rate
Field.Description: Previous @{Properties.AcceleratedReport1Rate} value.

Field.Name: LogReport1Rate
Field.Description: Current @{Properties.LogReport1Rate} value.

Field.Name: OldLogReport1Rate
Field.Description: Previous @{Properties.LogReport1Rate} value.

Field.Name: ChangeSource
Field.Description: Source of the change. The field value is OtaMessage when properties are changed over-the-air via a @{ToMobileMessages.SetConfigReport2|SetConfigReport2} message; otherwise Console.

Field.Name: Timestamp
Field.Description: GPS UTC fix time in seconds since the epoch or terminal UTC time if GPS is blocked (see StatusBitmap). If GPS is blocked and the terminal is power cycled before terminal UTC time becomes known, 0 is used.

Field.Name: StatusBitmap
Field.Description: Bitmap of current debounced VMS states. See @{Event.EventStateId}.

Field.Name: StandardReport2Interval
Field.Description: Current @{Properties.StandardReport2Interval} value.

Field.Name: OldStandardReport2Interval
Field.Description: Previous @{Properties.StandardReport2Interval} value.

Field.Name: AcceleratedReport2Rate
Field.Description: Current @{Properties.AcceleratedReport2Rate} value.

Field.Name: OldAcceleratedReport2Rate
Field.Description: Previous @{Properties.AcceleratedReport2Rate} value.

Field.Name: LogReport2Rate
Field.Description: Current @{Properties.LogReport2Rate} value.

Field.Name: OldLogReport2Rate
Field.Description: Previous @{Properties.LogReport2Rate} value.

Field.Name: ChangeSource
Field.Description: Source of the change. The field value is OtaMessage when properties are changed over-the-air via a @{ToMobileMessages.SetConfigReport3|SetConfigReport3} message; otherwise Console.

Field.Name: Timestamp
Field.Description: GPS UTC fix time in seconds since the epoch or terminal UTC time if GPS is blocked (see StatusBitmap). If GPS is blocked and the terminal is power cycled before terminal UTC time becomes known, 0 is used.

Field.Name: StatusBitmap
Field.Description: Bitmap of current debounced VMS states. See @{Event.EventStateId}.

Field.Name: StandardReport3Interval

Field.Name: OldLogReport3Rate

Message.Name: StandardReport1
Message.Description: This is the standard report 1 periodically sent at @{Properties.StandardReport1Interval|StandardReport1Interval}.

Field.Name: Timestamp
Field.Description: GPS UTC fix time in seconds since the epoch or terminal UTC time if GPS is blocked (see StatusBitmap). If GPS is blocked and the terminal is power cycled before terminal UTC time becomes known, 0 is used.

Field.Name: Latitude
Field.Description: GPS latitude in milli-minute resolution. If a valid GPS fix was never acquired, value 5460000 (equivalent to 91 degree) is used.

Field.Name: Longitude
Field.Description: GPS longitude in milli-minute resolution. If a valid GPS fix was never acquired, value 10860000 (equivalent to 181 degree) is used.

Field.Name: Speed
Field.Description: GPS speed in tenths of knots. 511 means 51.1 knots or more.

Field.Name: Course
Field.Description: GPS course in degrees. 361 is used when the speed is 0 knots.

Field.Name: Hdop
Field.Description: HDOP (Horizontal Dilution of Precision), a metric indicating GPS quality (255 if unavailable).

Field.Name: NumSats
Field.Description: Number of GPS satellites.

Field.Name: IdpCnr
Field.Description: IDP Average Carrier to Noise Ratio for the last full minute, in tenths of dBHz (0 if unavailable). 1023 means 102.3 dBHz or more.

Field.Name: StatusBitmap
Field.Description: Bitmap of current debounced VMS states. See @{Event.EventStateId}.

Message.Name: AcceleratedReport1
Message.Description:
This is the accelerated report 1 periodically sent at shorter interval, which is calculated as follow:
accelerated_report_interval = @{Properties.StandardReport1Interval|StandardReport1Interval} / @{Properties.AcceleratedReport1Rate|AcceleratedReport1Rate}

Field.Name: Timestamp
Field.Description: GPS UTC fix time in seconds since the epoch or terminal UTC time if GPS is blocked (see StatusBitmap). If GPS is blocked and the terminal is power cycled before terminal UTC time becomes known, 0 is used.

Field.Name: Latitude
Field.Description: GPS latitude in milli-minute resolution. If a valid GPS fix was never acquired, value 5460000 (equivalent to 91 degree) is used.

Field.Name: Longitude
Field.Description: GPS longitude in milli-minute resolution. If a valid GPS fix was never acquired, value 10860000 (equivalent to 181 degree) is used.

Field.Name: Speed
Field.Description: GPS speed in tenths of knots. 511 means 51.1 knots or more.

Field.Name: Course
Field.Description: GPS course in degrees. 361 is used when the speed is 0 knots.

Field.Name: Hdop
Field.Description: HDOP (Horizontal Dilution of Precision), a metric indicating GPS quality (255 if unavailable).

Field.Name: NumSats
Field.Description: Number of GPS satellites.

Field.Name: IdpCnr
Field.Description: IDP Average Carrier to Noise Ratio for the last full minute, in tenths of dBHz (0 if unavailable). 1023 means 102.3 dBHz or more.

Field.Name: StatusBitmap
Field.Description: Bitmap of current debounced VMS states. See @{Event.EventStateId}.

Message.Name: LogReport1
Message.Description:
This is the log-only report 1 logged periodically at sent at shorter interval, which is calculated as follow:
log_report_interval = @{Properties.StandardReport1Interval|StandardReport1Interval} / @{Properties.LogReport1Rate|LogReport1Rate}

Message.Name: AbnormalReport
Message.Description: This message is registered when a VMS event changes state. See @{Event}.

Field.Name: Timestamp
Field.Description: GPS UTC fix time in seconds since the epoch or terminal UTC time if GPS is blocked (see StatusBitmap). If GPS is blocked and the terminal is power cycled before terminal UTC time becomes known, 0 is used.

Field.Name: Latitude
Field.Description: GPS latitude in milli-minute resolution. If a valid GPS fix was never acquired, value 5460000 (equivalent to 91 degree) is used.

Field.Name: Longitude
Field.Description: GPS longitude in milli-minute resolution. If a valid GPS fix was never acquired, value 10860000 (equivalent to 181 degree) is used.

Field.Name: Speed
Field.Description: GPS speed in tenths of knots. 511 means 51.1 knots or more.

Field.Name: Course
Field.Description: GPS course in degrees. 361 is used when the speed is 0 knots.

Field.Name: Hdop
Field.Description: HDOP (Horizontal Dilution of Precision), a metric indicating GPS quality (255 if unavailable).

Field.Name: NumSats
Field.Description: Number of GPS satellites.

Field.Name: IdpCnr
Field.Description: IDP Average Carrier to Noise Ratio for the last full minute, in tenths of dBHz (0 if unavailable). 1023 means 102.3 dBHz or more.

Field.Name: StatusBitmap
Field.Description: Bitmap of current debounced VMS states. See @{Event.EventStateId}.

Field.Name: EventType
Field.Description: The event type that triggered this report.
